<<<<<<< HEAD
The Bishop of Gallovvay his dikaiologie contayning a iust defence of his former apologie. Against the iniust imputations of Mr. Dauid Hume. Cowper, William, 1568-1619. Hume, David, 1560?-1630?
[8], 183, [1] p.
Printed by Thomas Snodham for Iohn Budge, and are to be sould at the great south-dore of Paules, and at Brittaines-Bursse, London : 1614.
The Bishop of Galloway = William Cowper. A partial printing of and reply to an admonitory letter sent by David Hume. Signatures: A-2A⁴. The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A". Often bound with: The Bishop of Galloway his apologie. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

[8], 183, [1] p.
Printed by Thomas Snodham for Iohn Budge, and are to be sould at the great south-dore of Paules, and at Brittaines-Bursse, London : 1614.
The Bishop of Galloway = William Cowper. A partial printing of and reply to an admonitory letter sent by David Hume. Signatures: A-2A⁴. The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A". Often bound with: The Bishop of Galloway his apologie. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

Brittaines-Bursse
